// tips 1 Instead of cramming the night before an exam, do something to de-stress and make sure to get a full night of sleep.
2 Make sure to arrive to your testing location on time with a positive attitude, extra writing utensils, and any other necessary materials.
3 Go into each exam with a plan of what strategies you will use and how you will budget your time among each section.
4 When in doubt, go with your gut, and make sure that all questions have an answer before handing in the exam (even if this means putting C for every unanswered question in the last minute)
5 While taking the exam, remain calm and make an effort to ignore distractions. When on a time constraint, every second counts!
